title: Crazy Delicious
overview: Across America, food is becoming more outrageous and daring as chefs experiment with new ingredients and techniques. Crazy Delicious highlights six extreme foods that seem imaginary but actually do exist. From lobster ice cream in Maine to pizza pot pie in Chicago to the most expensive cheesesteak in Philadelphia, these are just a few of the over-the-top dishes making diners grab their forks and take notice.
